detailsOfAchievement: Srajan Shodh Sansthan Samitti Ujjain was established in the year 2007 with the prime object of Educational, Social Welfare of SC/ST/Minorities, Tribal and the other needy people of the society and especially to uplift child and women development. The society is registered under M.P Society Act 1973 under serial 44, Registration No 07/33/01/07253/07 dated 20-12-2007. The main motto of the society is to empower educational, Socio- economic, technical education skills of the needy people and make them socially, economically and educationally strong so that they will be able to live a main stream life. For achieving the objectives of the organizational strategy is to motivate minority people towards education, technical education and other integrated development through mobilizing natural and human resource. The society had got the work order to run a skill development program for the marginalized group we are working, for year 2015-16 and 2016-17 through order no. LOA/WA No: GAIL/CSR/3014/6300001429/01/15-16 and 16-17 of Rs 1,10,00,000/- The program is running successfully and had trained more than 500 students in different trades like computer software and hardware, Beauty Parlor ,Fashion Designing, Silai Kadai etc and more than 500 students are getting skilled currently. The society is going onward to start Block and Batik printing classes. We are aiming to work for adolescence girls through an awareness program based on Sanitary Napkin in Health and Hygiene program. The society is willing to work in rural sector for Bio-Diversity and watershed Program and is hopeful to be sanctioned. These projects are under procedure of sanctioning. We had a team of trained educated resourceful person and a passionate list to work for the people of community but financial constraint is encroaching us tight enough to undertake programme and maintain the organization initially with the assistance from benevolent people within our circle. But permanently this is high time to be assisted by Donor agencies to service in adequate fashion. We are glad instill of financial constrain we have been able to undertake and run the following need base programme with the help of local sponsors and donors for the benefit of the community people in general- 1. Technical Education programme for socio economic development( Mini ITI Sponsored by GAIL India ltd) 2. EDPs for minority people 3. Awareness programme 4. Socio-economic programme 5. Health and Education programme 6. Adult Education programme 7. Sports and Cultural programme 8. Cutting and Tailoring Program 9. AIDS Awareness Program. 10. Running Residential Education Program. 11. Vocational Training Program. 12. Nasha Mukti Camp. 13. Running Social Economic Program. 14. Child and Women Health Program. 15. Handicapped Program. 16. Welfare Program. 17. Rural Development Program. 18. Sports and Culture Program. 19. Seminar Programme.
